oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Aired Performance - 1946-09-07 - KOMA - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part one of an aired performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on September 7, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys; Ann Bond; Hiram Higsby; Prairie Songbirds;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Opening theme and statements / (1:30) Hiram Higsby tells a joke / (1:50) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform "Red Wing" / (3:13) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (3:28) Hiram Higsby and Ann Bond tell a joke / (3:57) Ann Bond performs "Wabash Cannonball" / (6:10) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (6:45) Hiram Higsby performs "The Covered Wagon Rolled Right Along" / (8:42) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (9:28) The Prairie Songbirds perform "I Left My Gal In The Mountains" / (11:08) Allan Page and Hiram Higsby tell a joke / (11:48) Dick Reinhart performs "Home In San Antone" / (13:55) Hiram Higsby and Lem Hawkins tell a joke [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Davis, Chuck; Bond, Ann; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975;
